org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.process
Class AeProcessStateWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.process.AeProcessStateWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeProcessStateWriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeMirroringProcessManager.AeCapturingProcessStateWriter, AeRepeatingProcessManager.AeRepeatingProcessStateWriter
public class AeProcessStateWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeProcessStateWriter

Writes process state to persistent storage.
